name: TechCorp Office
description: A typical tech company office during a server crisis morning

locations.name: Building Lobby
locations.description: A spacious modern lobby with marble floors and a reception desk.

locations.name: Courtyard
locations.description: A small outdoor courtyard with benches and a fountain.

locations.name: Main Hallway
locations.description: A long hallway with motivational posters on the walls.

locations.name: Open Plan Office
locations.description: A busy open plan office with rows of desks and monitors.

locations.name: Manager's Office
locations.description: A private corner office with a large desk and awards on the wall.

locations.name: Meeting Room Alpha
locations.description: A conference room with projector and whiteboard.

locations.name: Break Room
locations.description: A cozy break room with coffee machine and refrigerator.

locations.name: Server Room
locations.description: A cold, noisy room with server racks and blinking lights.

objects.name: Espresso Machine
objects.mechanics: Standard coffee machine. Can make espresso, latte, or cappuccino. Takes about 2 minutes per drink.

objects.name: Refrigerator
objects.description: A refrigerator stocked with drinks and lunches.
objects.mechanics: Opens to reveal contents. Contains various drinks and employee lunches.

objects.name: Microwave
objects.mechanics: Standard microwave. Can heat food items. Takes 1-3 minutes depending on item.

objects.name: Office Printer
objects.description: A large laser printer that frequently jams.
objects.mechanics: Currently jammed. Requires opening the front panel and clearing paper. Anyone can attempt to fix it.

objects.name: Primary Server
objects.description: The main server running critical systems. Warning lights blinking.
objects.mechanics: CRITICAL: Overheating due to cooling system failure. Requires IT expertise to diagnose. May need to check cooling fans or apply thermal paste. If not fixed soon, may crash and cause data loss.

objects.name: System Monitor
objects.description: A computer showing system dashboards with red alerts.
objects.mechanics: Displays real-time server status. Currently showing thermal alerts for Primary Server. Can be used to run diagnostics.

objects.name: Water Cooler
objects.description: The unofficial social hub of the office.
objects.mechanics: Dispenses cold water. Popular spot for casual conversations.

objects.name: Courtyard Fountain
objects.mechanics: Decorative only. Makes soothing water sounds.

agents.name: Alice
agents.personality: Organized and responsible, but easily stressed when things go wrong.
agents.background: Former legal assistant for 5 years at a high-pressure firm. Switched careers last year.
agents.initial_goal: Check morning emails and make sure everyone has what they need.

agents.name: Bob
agents.personality: Quiet and focused. Loves coffee and hates interruptions.
agents.background: Self-taught programmer who started coding at age 12. Dropped out of college to join a startup.
agents.initial_goal: Get coffee before debugging that production bug.

agents.name: Charlie
agents.personality: Experienced and calm under pressure. Knows every system inside out.
agents.background: Worked as a systems administrator for 20 years across finance and healthcare sectors.
agents.initial_goal: Investigate the server overheating alerts before they cause an outage.

agents.name: Diana
agents.personality: Energetic and social. Always chatting with colleagues.
agents.background: Graduated with a BA in Communications last year. Organized campus events as student council president.
agents.initial_goal: Find someone to brainstorm ideas for the new campaign.

agents.name: Eve
agents.personality: Ambitious and results-driven. Currently stressed about quarterly targets.
agents.background: Holds an MBA from a top-tier business school. Previously managed a sales team at a Fortune 500 company.
agents.initial_goal: Review quarterly reports and prepare for the 10 AM meeting.
